rows.label: soul22_P0101
rows.name: Ready? Let's move in!

rows.label: soul22_P0102
rows.name:
I'm striking first! Use a melee
 attack to stagger them!

rows.label: soul22_P0103
rows.name:
Strike up close for
 an adrenaline boost!

rows.label: soul22_P0201
rows.name:
Attack at range!
 Follow my lead!

rows.label: soul22_P0202
rows.name: I'll take point! Buff me up!

rows.label: soul22_P0203
rows.name:
This could get ugly.
 Weaken the enemy!

rows.label: soul22_P0301
rows.name:
I'm going all out!
 Let's send 'em flying!

rows.label: soul22_P0302
rows.name:
I'll get us off to a good start!
 Open fire!

rows.label: soul22_P0303
rows.name: Stay alert! Auras up!

rows.label: soul22_P0401
rows.name:
I should be doing better...
 Heal me!

rows.label: soul22_P0402
rows.name:
They're tough.
 I could use some help!

rows.label: soul22_P0403
rows.name: That is IT! Buff me up!

rows.label: soul22_P0501
rows.name:
I got a little reckless...
 Please, heal me...

rows.label: soul22_P0502
rows.name:
Joke's over. Heal me so I can
 pay them back in spades!

rows.label: soul22_P0503
rows.name:
I can still fight.
 Buff me up and I'll prove it!

rows.label: soul22_P0601
rows.name:
Land one more hit
 for me... Promise...

rows.label: soul22_P0602
rows.name:
I'm sorry... Just shoot
 them while you can...

rows.label: soul22_P0603
rows.name:
I was stupid... Use an
 aura and fight back...!

rows.label: soul22_P0701
rows.name: Yes! Now, melee attacks!

rows.label: soul22_P0702
rows.name:
Nice! How about
 some cover fire?

rows.label: soul22_P0703
rows.name: Now! Cripple that freak!

rows.label: soul22_P0801
rows.name:
Appendage destroyed!
 Follow with a melee attack!

rows.label: soul22_P0802
rows.name:
That did something!
 Try toppling it with gunfire!

rows.label: soul22_P0803
rows.name:
Destroyed! Now weaken
 them some more!

rows.label: soul22_P0901
rows.name:
They're not so tough!
 Aim for their vitals!

rows.label: soul22_P0902
rows.name:
Buff us up! It's gonna take
 time to bring them down!

rows.label: soul22_P0903
rows.name:
They'll outlast us in a long battle.
 Use Overclock and make this quick!

rows.label: soul22_P1001
rows.name: Go, me! Now close the gap!

rows.label: soul22_P1002
rows.name: There! An opening! Blast 'em!

rows.label: soul22_P1003
rows.name:
Now we're talking.
 Weaken them!

rows.label: soul22_P1101
rows.name:
I feel amazing!
 Are you using auras?

rows.label: soul22_P1102
rows.name:
My mind is so clear.
 These auras are incredible!

rows.label: soul22_P1103
rows.name:
The real fight starts now.
 Buff up and attack!

rows.label: soul22_P1201
rows.name: Let's end this. Overclock!

rows.label: soul22_P1202
rows.name:
Victory is within reach.
 It's time for Overclock!

rows.label: soul22_P1203
rows.name:
I'll wipe the floor with 'em!
 Use an aura!

rows.label: soul22_C0101
rows.name:
Heh, too easy.
 Move in on the next one!

rows.label: soul22_C0102
rows.name:
Bye-bye!
 Now, target that one!

rows.label: soul22_C0103
rows.name:
That one's next.
 Buff up and crush 'em!

rows.label: soul22_C0201
rows.name:
Way too slow!
 Whip out an aura!

rows.label: soul22_C0202
rows.name:
You can't outsmart me!
 Buff up and hit 'em hard!

rows.label: soul22_C0203
rows.name: Sorry, not even close! Fire!

rows.label: soul22_C0301
rows.name:
Now's your chance!
 Melee attacks!

rows.label: soul22_C0302
rows.name:
Awww yess!
 Hit 'em again!

rows.label: soul22_C0303
rows.name:
I'm on fire!
 Get in there and join the fun!

rows.label: soul22_C0401
rows.name:
Thanks, weatherâ€”great timing!
 We need to brace ourselves!

rows.label: soul22_C0402
rows.name:
This weather is awful.
 Prep an aura!

rows.label: soul22_C0403
rows.name:
We need to muscle our way
 through this. Weaken them!

rows.label: soul22_C0501
rows.name:
Check out this speed!
 Are you all buffed up?!

rows.label: soul22_C0502
rows.name:
I feel so light!
 Buff up and smash 'em!

rows.label: soul22_C0503
rows.name:
Let's mix things up.
 Use Overclock!

rows.label: soul22_C0601
rows.name:
You read my mind!
 Let's get swinging!

rows.label: soul22_C0602
rows.name:
I can handle myself!
 Just keep shooting!

rows.label: soul22_C0603
rows.name:
Uh, thanks, but maybe
 you should prep an aura!

rows.label: soul22_C0701
rows.name:
Thanks! Time to
 get buffed!

rows.label: soul22_C0702
rows.name:
I owe you! Don't forget
 to buff up!

rows.label: soul22_C0703
rows.name:
Good timing!
 Prep your aura!

rows.label: soul22_C0801
rows.name:
Back off!
 Use melee attacks!

rows.label: soul22_C0802
rows.name:
Just die already!
 Concentrate your fire!

rows.label: soul22_C0803
rows.name: Come on! Help me out!

rows.label: soul22_C0901
rows.name: Fire! And don't miss!

rows.label: soul22_C0902
rows.name: Target in sight. Fire now!

rows.label: soul22_C0903
rows.name:
They're wide open!
 Hit 'em with ranged attacks!

rows.label: soul22_C1001
rows.name:
I took 'em down!
 Switch to melee!

rows.label: soul22_C1002
rows.name:
Down you go!
 Suppressive fire!

rows.label: soul22_C1003
rows.name:
Now's our chance!
 Cripple 'em!

rows.label: soul22_C1101
rows.name:
That'll stop them a while.
 Get in there and thrash 'em!

rows.label: soul22_C1102
rows.name:
I've immobilized them.
 Aim carefully!

rows.label: soul22_C1103
rows.name:
I stunned 'em!
 Now weaken them!

rows.label: soul22_C1201
rows.name:
Get ready for the worst
 wake-up call ever!

rows.label: soul22_C1202
rows.name:
I put 'em to sleep!
 Pick them off!

rows.label: soul22_C1203
rows.name:
Asleep, huh? Maybe we'll
 have to kick you awake!

rows.label: soul22_C1301
rows.name: Nabbed one! Strike now!

rows.label: soul22_C1302
rows.name: I got 'em! Light 'em up!

rows.label: soul22_C1303
rows.name:
This should hold 'em. Move in
 and make sure they stay down!

rows.label: soul22_C1401
rows.name: I blew it... Patch me up!

rows.label: soul22_C1402
rows.name:
This damage is nothing.
 Move in and attack!

rows.label: soul22_C1403
rows.name:
You'll pay for that!
 Counterattack at range!

rows.label: soul22_C1501
rows.name:
My Doll! We need to
 heal up and regroup!

rows.label: soul22_C1502
rows.name:
You think you've won? Buff
 up, 'cause we're fighting back!

rows.label: soul22_C1503
rows.name:
This isn't over until
 we use OVERCLOCK!

rows.label: soul22_C1601
rows.name:
That's all the fuel I have?
 I need more to fight!

rows.label: soul22_C1602
rows.name:
My fuel's low!
 Gimme a re-up!

rows.label: soul22_C1603
rows.name:
This isn't good.
 I need to secure more fuel!
